titleStmt.title: Sermons preach'd upon several occasions By John Tillotson, D.D. Dean of Canterbury, preacher to the Honourable Society of Lincolns-Inn, and one of His Majesties chaplains in ordinary. The second volume.
titleStmt.author: Tillotson, John, 1630-1694.

titleStmt.title: Sermons preach'd upon several occasions By John Tillotson, D.D. Dean of Canterbury, preacher to the Honourable Society of Lincolns-Inn, and one of His Majesties chaplains in ordinary. The second volume.
titleStmt.author: Tillotson, John, 1630-1694.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Edw. Gellibrand, and are to be sold by Henry Bonwicke, at the Red-Lyon in St. Paul's-Church-Yard,

notesStmt.note: With an initial imprimatur leaf dated Novemb. 2, 1677.
With two title pages; title taken from second title page, first title page torn and not included in pagination or foliation.
Each sermon has divisional title page; each sermon within quires b-g has a separate pagination.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
